output.sentences: Last night, we were excited to have some fun.
We got in the car and drove, seeing the pretty lights of our destination from afar.
The ferris wheel illumnated the darkness, and we couldn't wait to go on.
We finally arrived at our location and couldn't wait to have a great night.
There were so many people in the lot that night.
